title.narrative: Designing a measurement tool to evaluate the impact of the Rule of Law for Business programme in China

description.narrative: This project aims to establish a monitoring and evaluation tool with core indicators of success to assess the progress and impact of the Rule of Law for Business programme. The programme will support China's progress on the rule of law for business including clearer judicial processes, commercial dispute resolution and protection of intellectual property, leading to an improved business environment and stronger economic growth. It is also expected to generate opportunities for international business, bringing benefits to British business in sectors where they are well placed to compete, including; Rule of Law, Energy and Low Carbon, Financial Services and Infrastructure.
